source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Make Fragrant Essential Oil Synergies and Blends
items.headline: Learn to create signature fragrances for personal or commercial use
objectives_summary: How to properly blend essential oils
How to categorize an essential oil for aroma
What notes are and what percentage they need to be in a blend

items.title: Art for Beginners: Learn to Draw Cartoon SUPER HEROES
items.headline: 40 Fun Drawing Lessons for Beginners to Learn Every Day for a Month. Build Focus, Confidence & Creative Thinking Skills.
objectives_summary: In 40 drawing and coloring lessons, learn to create cartoon superheroes!
Participate in active creativity, which is great for improving and developing motor skills, confidence, focus and expression.
Learn how to create your own unique superhero drawings by following a step-by-step process during our exercises.

items.title: Willow Weaving Garden Obelisks and Plant Cages.
items.headline: Learning the Pairing Weave
objectives_summary: Willow weaving techniques to enable you to create plant cages and obelisks to accommodate the nature of the plants you grow in your garden.
Pairing Weave

items.title: Animal Drawing - Draw and Sketch Animal with Pencil

visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh

visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei

items.headline: Animal drawing and animal sketching with pencil step by step. learn how to draw and sketch animal. Drawing is cool art
objectives_summary: Acquaint students with how to draw animals in the simplest possible ways
Expected to become proficient in analyzing the shape of the head and body of animals and to be able to simplify and sketch the picture of different animals
Learn simple linear sketch, use soft shades or hatches to give the volume, dimension and texture.

items.title: Origami, Japanese Paper crafts ‐ Challenge course 1
items.headline: Origami basic course. You can learn 25 types of origami from easy to slightly difficult in an easy-to-understand manner
objectives_summary: 25 Let's learn how to make origami
Basic way to fold origami
Communication using origami

items.title: How to Paint Landscapes with Pastels - Learn to use Pastel
items.headline: Learn to Paint 3 Landscapes using Pastel Sticks. Follow Colin and learn an impressionistic style that you can replicate
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint 3 landscapes with pastel sticks
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Learn tattooing, complete basic tattoo course
items.headline: Tattoorials, learn tattooing the easy way
objectives_summary: After this course you will know all the basics that are essential for an efficient implementation in the tattoo studio and at the customer, how to avoid the typical beginner mistakes and prepare yourself optimally for your first real stitches.

items.title: Drafting and Sewing the Perfect Pattern for Ladies Trouser
items.headline: Drafting and Sewing the Perfect Pattern for Ladies Trouser with Zipper and Fly
objectives_summary: You will learn how to draft fitted trouser/pant pattern and use the pattern to create trouser variation by drafting trouser with zipper fly and a curved waistband. I will also show you how to cut your desired fabrics with the patterns we drafted and a step by step tutorial on how to sew the trouser with zipper fly and a curved waistband.
You will also learn an easier way to sew your zipper fly
Drafting and Sewing

items.title: Fondant Bas Relief Designs for gorgeous Cakes
items.headline: On-trend Cake decorating: Learn how to create amazing visual interest and textures in Fondant
objectives_summary: How to create a stunning Bas Relief design, with so many different options to explore
How to use silicone moulds to create beautifully detailed fondant pieces
How to make design choices that add up to a pleasing overall design

items.title: Easy Abstract Compositions
items.headline: Five compositions to boost your art practice
objectives_summary: Learn about different materials to create a painting
Learn to use compositions from scratch
Learn 5 different compositional formats

items.title: Learn to Paint Bison in Mist Step-by-Step
items.headline: Instructional Painting Video with additional Art Business Lectures!
objectives_summary: Students will develop a broader understanding of painting techniques and developing a painting through common stages. The student will also have a painting to enjoy and hang on their wall!
Students will learn how to frame, market, sell and ship their paintings to customers.

items.title: How to Paint a Beautiful English Landscape in Watercolour
items.headline: Learn Colin's unique approach to watercolor and see how to paint this stunningly detailed landscape of Aylesford in Kent
objectives_summary: Learn a new approach to painting watercolour
Apply these new techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolour

items.title: How To Draw Landscapes Vol 2 - Snow, Beach and Rural Scenes
items.headline: Learn How to Draw 3 AMAZING English Landscapes in different locations with EASY to follow step by step videos.
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 stunning landscapes
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Create Simple Videos at Home : Learn Video, Light & Sound!

visible_instructors.name: Red Cape
visible_instructors.job_title: Filmmaking Education, Cameras, Lighting, Audio and More!
visible_instructors.title: Red Cape Learning

items.headline: Create Amazing Videos at Home with Great Lighting, proper Camera Settings and quality Sound!
objectives_summary: How to Film with any Camera
How to Record Great Sound
How to Light Videos

items.title: Journey on Silk
items.headline: The Art of Painting on Silk
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, students will understand the elements of design, emphasising line, tone and colour.
Students will feel confident in producing a design suitable for painting on silk.
Students will learn how to draw, emphasising line and tone.

items.title: Realistic Portrait: Paint A Vietnamese Child In Watercolor
items.headline: Unlock your potential! Paint a realistic portrait step by step in Watercolor, no hassle!
objectives_summary: You will feel more comfortable with the watercolor, you will be not afraid to make mistakes and experiments.
You will learn how to use layering to paint a face.
You will figure out hot to control your brush to work on tiny details such as eyes or lips.
